content.question:
Analyze the influence of TWO of the following on American-Soviet relations in the decade following the Second World War. 

Yalta Conference
Communist revolution in China 
Korean War
McCarthyism

frqParts.text:
Analyze the influence of TWO of the following on American-Soviet relations in the decade following the Second World War. 

Yalta Conference
Communist revolution in China 
Korean War
McCarthyism

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
